alert.note: Alert for Baylor; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 11 at 2:30AM CST until January 11 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Expected Wednesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR PARTS OF WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN NORTH TEXAS FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, DRY FUELS, AND BREEZY CONDITIONS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for Critical fire weather conditions, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM CST this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...12 pm to 8 pm. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES...70 to 80 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
